# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that cater to your needs and desires, making it an invaluable asset. Considering its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $200 for this remarkable product. I believe this offer reflects its true value and presents a great opportunity for you to benefit from its capabilities. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in excellence. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
